title: How to Unlock World 4 in Super Mario Bros. DS

steps.title: Go to the final castle level in World 2.
steps.content: Go to the final castle level in World 2. World 2 is the desert world. Play all the way through World 2 until you get to the castle level.

steps.title: Get the mini-mushroom.
steps.content: Get the mini-mushroom. You can find the mini-mushroom towards the end of the castle level. When you see the large rolling spike ball, jump on the rope that hangs over the spike ball. Swing and jump to the platform to the right that has two question mark boxes. The second box has a mini-mushroom. This transforms you into Mini-Mario. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Get to the end of the level as Mini-Mario.
steps.content: Get to the end of the level as Mini-Mario. There's another power-up later in the level. Do not get it! You have to get to the end of the level as Mini-Mario.

steps.title: Defeat the worm as Mini-Mario.
steps.content: Defeat the worm as Mini-Mario. In order to do damage to the worm as Mini-Mario, you will need to do a ground pound. Luckily as Mini-Mario, you can jump much higher. You can even bounce from one wall to the other. When the worm is directly under Mario, press down on the D-pad to do a ground pound. Repeat 3 times to defeat the worm. At the end of the level, Mini-Mario will be able to fall through the gap in the floor that leads to World 4.
